title: Concavity Explorer
description: Interactive MicroSim for exploring concave up and concave down regions of functions. Students drag a point along a curve to see how the tangent line rotates, observe the second derivative graph, and understand the connection between the sign of f''(x) and concavity.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Calculus
